# nios_dhcp_ipv6dhcpoptionspace (Resource)

Manages an IPv6 DHCP Option Space.

## Example Usage

```terraform
// Create an Ipv6 DHCP Option Space with Basic Fields
resource "nios_dhcp_ipv6dhcpoptionspace" "ipv6_dhcp_option_space_with_basic_fields" {
  name              = "example_ipv6_dhcp_option_space"
  enterprise_number = 5473
}

// Create an Ipv6 DHCP Option Definition
resource "nios_dhcp_ipv6dhcpoptiondefinition" "ipv6_dhcp_option_definition" {
  name  = "example_option_definition"
  code  = 1234
  space = nios_dhcp_ipv6dhcpoptionspace.ipv6_dhcp_option_space_with_basic_fields.name
  type  = "string"
}

// Create an Ipv6 DHCP Option Space with Additional Fields
resource "nios_dhcp_ipv6dhcpoptionspace" "ipv6_dhcp_option_space_with_additional_fields" {
  name               = "example_ipv6_dhcp_option_space_2"
  enterprise_number  = 5678
  option_definitions = [nios_dhcp_ipv6dhcpoptiondefinition.ipv6_dhcp_option_definition.name]
  comment            = "IPv6 DHCP Option Space created by Terraform"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `enterprise_number` (Number) The enterprise number of a DHCP IPv6 option space object.
- `name` (String) The name of a DHCP IPv6 option space object.

### Optional

- `comment` (String) A descriptive comment of a DHCP IPv6 option space object.
- `option_definitions` (List of String) The list of DHCP IPv6 option definition objects.

### Read-Only

- `ref` (String) The reference to the object.
